00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board_config.h"

00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */

00036 /** @addtogroup I2C_Examples I2C
00037   * @{

00040 /** @addtogroup I2C_Interrupt
00041   * @{
00042   */

00045 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #define I2C1_SLAVE_ADDRESS     0x60
00047 #define BufferSize             4
00048 
00049 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 extern u8 I2C0_Master_Buffer_Tx[];
00051 extern u8 I2C0_Master_Buffer_Rx[];
00052 extern u8 I2C1_Slave_Buffer_Rx[];
00053 
00054 extern vu8 I2C0_Master_Tx_Index, I2C0_Master_Rx_Index,  \
00055            I2C1_Slave_Tx_Index,  I2C1_Slave_Rx_Index;
00056 
00057 extern u32 IsMasterRxFinish;
00058 
00059 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00061  * @brief   This function handles NMI exception.
00062  * @retval  None
00063  ************************************************************************************************************/
00064 void NMI_Handler(void)
00065 {
00066 }
00067 
00068 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00069  * @brief   This function handles Hard Fault exception.
00070  * @retval  None
00071  ************************************************************************************************************/
00072 void HardFault_Handler(void)
00073 {
00074   #if 1
00075 
00076   static vu32 gIsContinue = 0;
00077   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00078   /* For development FW, MCU run into the while loop when the hardfault occurred.                           */
00079   /* 1. Stack Checking                                                                                      */
00080   /*    When a hard fault exception occurs, MCU push following register into the stack (main or process     */
00081   /*    stack). Confirm R13(SP) value in the Register Window and typing it to the Memory Windows, you can   */
00082   /*    check following register, especially the PC value (indicate the last instruction before hard fault).*/
00083   /*    SP + 0x00    0x04    0x08    0x0C    0x10    0x14    0x18    0x1C                                   */
00084   /*           R0      R1      R2      R3     R12      LR      PC    xPSR                                   */
00085   while (gIsContinue == 0)
00086   {
00087   }
00088   /* 2. Step Out to Find the Clue                                                                           */
00089   /*    Change the variable "gIsContinue" to any other value than zero in a Local or Watch Window, then     */
00090   /*    step out the HardFault_Handler to reach the first instruction after the instruction which caused    */
00091   /*    the hard fault.                                                                                     */
00092   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00093 
00094   #else
00095 
00096   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097   /* For production FW, you shall consider to reboot the system when hardfault occurred.                    */
00098   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00099   NVIC_SystemReset();
00100 
00101   #endif
00102 }
00103

00128 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00129  * @brief   This function handles I2C0 interrupt.
00130  * @retval  None
00131  ************************************************************************************************************/
00132 void I2C0_IRQHandler(void)
00133 {
00134   switch (I2C_ReadRegister(HT_I2C0, I2C_REGISTER_SR))
00135   {
00136     /*-----------------------------Master Transmitter ------------------------------------------------------*/
00137     case I2C_MASTER_SEND_START:
00138       break;
00139 
00140     case I2C_MASTER_TRANSMITTER_MODE:
00141       /* Send the first data to I2C1                                                                        */
00142       I2C_SendData(HT_I2C0, I2C0_Master_Buffer_Tx[I2C0_Master_Tx_Index ++]);
00143       break;
00144 
00145     case I2C_MASTER_TX_EMPTY:
00146       if (I2C0_Master_Tx_Index < BufferSize)
00147       {
00148         /* Send the remainder data to I2C1                                                                  */
00149         I2C_SendData(HT_I2C0, I2C0_Master_Buffer_Tx[I2C0_Master_Tx_Index ++]);
00150       }
00151 
00152       else
00153       {
00154         /* Send I2C0 re-START & I2C1 slave address for read                                                 */
00155         I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HT_I2C0, I2C1_SLAVE_ADDRESS, I2C_MASTER_READ);
00156       }
00157       break;
00158 
00159     /*-----------------------------Master Receiver ---------------------------------------------------------*/
00160     case I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE:
00161       /* Enable I2C0 ACK for receiving data                                                                 */
00162       I2C_AckCmd(HT_I2C0, ENABLE);
00163       break;
00164 
00165     case I2C_MASTER_RX_NOT_EMPTY:
00166       /* Receive data sent from I2C1                                                                        */
00167       I2C0_Master_Buffer_Rx[I2C0_Master_Rx_Index ++] = I2C_ReceiveData(HT_I2C0);
00168       if (I2C0_Master_Rx_Index == BufferSize - 1)
00169       {
00170         /* Disable I2C0 ACK                                                                                 */
00171         I2C_AckCmd(HT_I2C0, DISABLE);
00172       }
00173       if (I2C0_Master_Rx_Index == BufferSize)
00174       {
00175         /* Reset Indexes for next transmission                                                              */
00176         I2C0_Master_Tx_Index = I2C0_Master_Rx_Index = 0;
00177         /* Generate STOP                                                                                    */
00178         I2C_GenerateSTOP(HT_I2C0);
00179         IsMasterRxFinish = TRUE;
00180       }
00181       break;
00182 
00183     default:
00184       break;
00185   }
00186 }
00187 
00188 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00189  * @brief   This function handles I2C1 interrupt.
00190  * @retval  None
00191  ************************************************************************************************************/
00192 void I2C1_IRQHandler(void)
00193 {
00194   switch (I2C_ReadRegister(HT_I2C1, I2C_REGISTER_SR))
00195   {
00196     /*-----------------------------Slave Receiver ----------------------------------------------------------*/
00197     case I2C_SLAVE_ACK_RECEIVER_ADDRESS:
00198       break;
00199 
00200     case I2C_SLAVE_RX_NOT_EMPTY:
00201       if (I2C1_Slave_Rx_Index < BufferSize)
00202       /* Receive data sent from I2C0                                                                        */
00203       I2C1_Slave_Buffer_Rx[I2C1_Slave_Rx_Index ++] = I2C_ReceiveData(HT_I2C1);
00204       break;
00205 
00206     /*-----------------------------Slave Transmitter -------------------------------------------------------*/
00207     case I2C_SLAVE_ACK_TRANSMITTER_ADDRESS:
00208       /* Send the first data to I2C0                                                                        */
00209       I2C_SendData(HT_I2C1, I2C1_Slave_Buffer_Rx[I2C1_Slave_Tx_Index ++]);
00210       break;
00211 
00212     case I2C_SLAVE_TX_EMPTY:
00213       if (I2C1_Slave_Tx_Index < BufferSize)
00214         /* Send the remainder data to I2C0                                                                  */
00215         I2C_SendData(HT_I2C1, I2C1_Slave_Buffer_Rx[I2C1_Slave_Tx_Index ++]);
00216       else
00217         /* Disable I2C1 TXDE interrupt                                                                      */
00218         I2C_IntConfig(HT_I2C1, I2C_INT_TXDE, DISABLE);
00219       break;
00220 
00221     case I2C_SLAVE_RECEIVED_NACK_STOP:
00222       /* Clear RXNACK flag                                                                                  */
00223       I2C_ClearFlag(HT_I2C1, I2C_FLAG_RXNACK);
00224       /* Reset Indexes for next transmission                                                                */
00225       I2C1_Slave_Tx_Index = I2C1_Slave_Rx_Index = 0;
00226       break;
00227 
00228     default:
00229       break;
00230   }
00231 }
